description: The fastest way to use ChatGPT, Claude, Bard, Bing anywhere online. Supports GPT-4, Code Interpreter, Web Browsing, Plugins.
name: MaxAI.me: Use ChatGPT AI Anywhere Online

settings.sign_in__description: Please sign in to manage your settings and create custom prompts
settings.sync__different_settings__description: We found different settings (including your custom prompts if any) on your local browser and online account. Your online account settings have overridden your local browser settings. If you prefer to keep your local browser settings instead, click the "Keep local browser settings" button now.
settings.sync__different_settings__chose_local_or: Be aware that you will lose your local browser settings permanently by keeping your online account settings and cannot be undone.
settings.sync__different_settings__keep_local_but: Are you sure you want to replace your online account settings with your local browser settings (including your custom prompts if any)? Doing so will undo your online account settings permanently and cannot be undone.
settings.feature_card__prompts__edit_prompt__fiel: The prompt will be directly sent to AI, which is the default "normal behavior". All prompt templates will have this option enabled by default.
The prompt first goes to the input box, allowing you to modify or add additional information before sending it to AI.
settings.feature_card__prompts__help__manage_your: Create prompt groups for nested menus
Rearrange prompts and groups via drag and drop
Read only prompts are non-editable and non-movable
settings.feature_card__prompts__prompt_template__: The template can include any number of the following pre-defined variables, or none at all:
This prompt template variable will be replaced with the text you selected on the current page.
write a better version of the follow text: {{SELECTED_TEXT}}
translate the following text to English: {{SELECTED_TEXT}}

This prompt template variable will be replaced with the "AI output language" selected on the Settings page.
If uncertain of the "Settings" page location, simply click the "Settings" icon found in the top bar within the side bar.
you will reply with ideas in {{AI_RESPONSE_LANGUAGE}}
When you use this variable in the prompt template, it will display the incoming email that needs a response.
When you use this variable in the prompt template, it will display the current draft present in the Gmail text box.
This prompt template variable will be replaced with the current website's domain.
reply to the following text on {{CURRENT_WEBSITE_DOMAIN}}
note that the text is from {{CURRENT_WEBSITE_DOMAIN}}
settings.feature_card__prompts__confirm__delete__: Are you sure you want to delete this item? Please note that once you delete it, the action cannot be undone.
settings.feature_card__prompts__confirm__restore_: Are you sure you want to reset to the default options? Please note that once you restore to defaults, the action cannot be undone.
settings.feature_card__openai_api_key__help__obta: Sign in to your OpenAI account. If you do not have an account,
Click 'Create new secret key' and copy & paste it into the "API key" input field on the left
settings.feature_card__openai_api_key__discover_a: Discover active models for your API key
settings.feature_card__openai_api_key__help__disc: Click "Model" to view all models activated for your API key
settings.feature_card__openai_api_key__check_cred: Check your OpenAI API usage and credit
settings.feature_card__openai_api_key__help__chec: Check your API usage and credit breakdown
settings.feature_card__openai_api_key__protips__i: OpenAI API is more stable than the ChatGPT free plan.
Be aware of potential usage-based fees from OpenAI.
Your API Key is securely stored in your browser, never shared elsewhere.
Expect potential usage instability during peak demand times with free OpenAI API key.
settings.feature_card__shortcut_hint__field_edit_: If the settings page for shortcuts indicates that the Cmd/Alt+J shortcut has already been set for MaxAI.me extension, please perform a force reconfiguration of the Cmd/Alt+J shortcut as instructed in the video.
settings.feature_card__appearance__field_pdf_view: Ability to select text in any PDF files and use prompts on them.
Enhanced PDF viewer features compared to the browser's built-in viewer.
Our PDF AI viewer only works with local PDF files at the moment.
Support for online PDF files is coming soon.
How to activate the extension on PDF file
Step 1: Open PDF file in browser
Step 2: Enable "PDF AI viewer" in extension settings
Step 3: Enable "Allow access to file URLs" in Chrome settings
Step 4: Re-open PDF in browser to use prompt on selected text
Protip: Make sure to enable both "PDF AI viewer" and "Allow access to file URLs" to activate the extension on PDF file
settings.feature_card__preferred_language__field_: Choose the preferred language for Al response.
MaxAI will show content in your preferred languages, when possible
settings.feature_card__ai_response_language__fiel: Choose the default language for Al response.
When "Auto" is selected, Al will respond in the same language variety or dialect as the selected text.
settings.feature_card__chatgpt_stable_mode__field: Set how long Stable Mode stays on after activation
Stable Mode will be disabled in
settings.feature_card__chatgpt_stable_mode__proti: ChatGPT stable mode is a feature that reduces ChatGPT interruptions and network errors.
settings.feature_card__perks__one_click_prompts__: Turn hours-long tasks into minutes using our expanding collection of prompts for marketing, sales, copywriting, operation, productivity, and customer support.
settings.feature_card__perks__rewards__card_title: Get up to 24 free weeks of MaxAI Pro!
settings.feature_card__perks__rewards__card_descr: Invite your friends to join MaxAI.me! For anyone who signs up using your referral link and installs MaxAI.me extension, we'll give you both one week of Pro for free! To extend your Pro access further,
settings.visibility_card__black_list_description: List of websites that have the mini menu hidden when selecting text.
settings.visibility_card__white_list_description: The prompt will only appear on the enabled sites. If no enabled sites are added, the prompt will be visible on all sites.
